import React from 'react' import './footer.css'; function TermsConditions() { return ( <>

Through the lens of discipline

  • Entry of each student 5 minutes prior to check-in.
  • Use it to maintain cleanliness in the school premises.
  • Students will not be sent home with anyone without the permission of the head of the institution.
  • Application for leave without parental signature will not be accepted.
  • It is mandatory for every student to come to school in uniform.
  • Teachers have to be respected in school.
  • Mobile phones are prohibited in the school premises. Rs 100/- when ripe. Will be economical.
  • If the student remains absent for 7 consecutive days, he will be removed from the enrollment without any notice. For re-enrolment, entry fee of Rs 200/- will be charged.
  • Homework has to be done on time.
  • Fees will have to be deposited on time.
    • Request to parents 1. Chhatra Dainik Nandani is a useful and simple medium for the exchange of ideas between you and us. Please use it. 2. Please read the school brochure carefully while applying for admission. 3. After school hours, keep an eye on your child so that he/she does not misuse the time. 4. It is mandatory for the student to have 75 percent attendance. 5. Send the student school uniform on time. 6. Your suggestions are also invited from time to time. 7. You students can contact Soya Pradhan on Dainik Mandani Kajnako 9829503629. 8. The aim of our group is the all-round development of boys and girls.
    ) } export default TermsConditions
